alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 27 at 1:22PM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 13 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 10 above zero could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
